attributes.action: Commission a Public Sector Service Medal for all workers service during pandemic
attributes.additional_details: During the current crisis NHS, Police, Fire Service, Prison Service, Armed Forces along with other Government Departments have worked above and beyond their normal working arrangements. Putting the needs of the Country ahead of their family. They have exposed themselves with little thought to their own personal health to support the sick & vulnerable. These selfless acts have resulted in the damage to their physical and emotional health and will have lasting effects on them and their families.
attributes.background: The Government to give formal recognition to the sacrifices made in the execution of their duties to the country and public during the current Covid19 Pandemic.

rejection.details:

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
